meaningMnemonic: Our <radical>leader</radical> has a <radical>lip ring</radical>. Wait, our leader has a lip ring? <kanji>WHAT</kanji>??
readingMnemonic: The leader with his lip ring is now eating some <reading>naan</reading> (なん) and curry. It's delicious, of course... but then he gets it caught on his lip ring, and tears half his lip off. He screams: "<reading>Nannnnn eeeeeeeeeehhh</reading>!!" (なに) in anger at the naan and curry.
